home.title: Welcome to My Profile
home.description: Unleash your imagination and turn ordinary moments into extraordinary creations.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Joshua Bondalo, a hardworking student who loves computer games. At first, I didn't like computer coding, but thanks to Sir Fritz, I'm starting to appreciate it now! Always eager to gain knowledge, I work hard to improve myself every day.

education.title: Education
education.description: I graduated Grade 12 from Camarines Sur National High School and earned an honor in the GAS strand through hard work and dedication.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can reach me via email at bondalojoshua5@gmail.com.

hobbies.title: My Hobbies
hobbies.description: My hobby is playing Roblox and creating stylish outfits for my avatar.
